General.Name: Raoom Trading Company SJSC
General.Description: Raoom trading Company manufactures, processes, and trades in glass, mirrors, and aluminum decorations in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Gulf countries. It offers insulating glass, security glass, stained glass, and decorative glass. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Buraydah, Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: The 1st Industrial City, Buraydah, Saudi Arabia
